title: The all-out revolt against Knitting.com helps explain boycotts at Reddit an
excerpt: The knitting world rose up against corporate ownership—and displayed the power of online communities

title: Why Losing Bonds Sports Fans
excerpt: A study on team loyalty among fans shows that club ranking plays an important role in how they identify with one another.

title: What Makes Someone a Fan?
excerpt: It’s more than just ticket sales. Rich Luker, a social psychologist, studies fandom and why, for example, someone might get a tattoo of their favorite team.
